result.title: Summer Programming School in Sevastopol
result.content:
First internation Summer Programming School in Sevastopol will take place from 5th to 13th of August. It will be hosted by Sevastopol National University of Nuclear Energy and Industry. The program contains 6 contest days (lecture, contest, discussion, upsolving, the sea :) ) and one resting day (upsolving, the sea :), the city :) ). Lecturers from Russia, Belarus, Georgia, India and Ukraine are invited. Teams from Georgia (Tbilisi) and China (Harbin) plan to attend the School. We invite everyone to join out School.

More innfomation onÂ http://summer-school.org.ua
